execution_plan.description: Find all goods ids that are classified as 'bakery'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE food = 'bakery';

execution_plan.description: For receipts that contain bakery goods, get the receipt id and the number of bakery items on each receipt.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, COUNT(*) AS item_count FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id) GROUP BY Receipt;

execution_plan.description: Map each receipt (that has bakery items) to its customer id.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve last names for all customers who appear on receipts that included bakery items. Application will aggregate counts per customer (using step 2 and step 3) and filter those with total > 10.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, lastname FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step3.CustomerId);
